00030 void CnipolRawExtendedHists::BookHists()
00031 {
00032    string shName;
00033    TH1*   hist;
00034 
00035    fDir->cd();
00036 
00037    shName = "hChIdVsBunchId";
00038    hist = new TH2I(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_BUNCHES, 0.5, N_BUNCHES+0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00039    hist->SetTitle("; Bunch Id; Channel Id; ");
00040    hist->SetOption("colz LOGZ");
00041    o[shName] = hist;
00042 
00043 
00044    DrawObjContainer        *oc;
00045    DrawObjContainerMapIter  isubdir;
00046 
00047    for (int iChId=1; iChId<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iChId++)
00048    {
00049       string sChId(MAX_CHANNEL_DIGITS, ' ');
00050       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", iChId);
00051 
00052       string dName = "channel" + sChId;
00053 
00054       isubdir = d.find(dName);
00055 
00056       if ( isubdir == d.end()) { // if dir not found
00057          oc = new DrawObjContainer();
00058          oc->fDir = new TDirectoryFile(dName.c_str(), dName.c_str(), "", fDir);
00059       } else {
00060          oc = isubdir->second;
00061       }
00062 
00063       oc->fDir->cd();
00064 
00065 
00066       for (UShort_t iBunchId=1; iBunchId<=N_BUNCHES; iBunchId++)
00067       {
00068          string sBunchId("   ");
00069          sprintf(&sBunchId[0], "%03d", iBunchId);
00070 
00071          // bunched histograms start here
00072          shName = "hTvsA_ch" + sChId + "_b" + sBunchId;
00073          hist = new TH2S(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 255, 0, 255, 80, 10, 90);
00074          hist->SetOption("colz LOGZ NOIMG");
00075          hist->SetTitle(";Amplitude, ADC;TDC;");
00076          oc->o[shName] = hist;
00077          fhTvsA_ch_b[iChId-1][iBunchId-1] = hist;
00078 
00079          //shName = "hTvsACumul_ch" + sChId + "_b" + sBunchId;
00080          //hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 100, 0, 1);
00081          //hist->SetOption("hist NOIMG");
00082          //hist->SetTitle("; Digi Channel Frac; Event Frac;");
00083          //hist->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(0, 1);
00084          //oc->o[shName] = hist;
00085          //fhTvsACumul_ch_b[iChId-1][iBunchId-1] = hist;
00086       }
00087 
00088       // If this is a new directory then we need to add it to the list
00089       if ( isubdir == d.end()) {
00090          d[dName] = oc;
00091       }
00092    }
00093 }

00097 void CnipolRawExtendedHists::FillPassOne(ChannelEvent *ch)
00098 {
00099    // Fill parent histograms
00100    //CnipolRawHists::FillPassOne(ch);
00101 
00102    UChar_t  chId     = ch->GetChannelId();
00103    UShort_t adcA_bin = ch->GetAmpltd() + 1;
00104    UShort_t adcI_bin = ch->GetIntgrl() + 1;
00105    UShort_t tdc_bin  = ch->GetTdc() - 10 + 1; // 10 is the lowest edge of the TvsA histograms
00106    UChar_t  bId      = ch->GetBunchId() + 1;
00107 
00108    // Speed up the filling process by getting the global bin number
00109    TH1* hist;
00110    Int_t gbin;
00111 
00112    //hist = fhTvsA_ch[chId-1];
00113    //gbin = hist->GetBin(adcA_bin, tdc_bin);
00114    //hist->AddBinContent(gbin);
00115    //hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00116 
00117    hist = fhTvsA_ch_b[chId-1][bId-1];
00118    gbin = hist->GetBin(adcA_bin, tdc_bin);
00119    hist->AddBinContent(gbin);
00120    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00121 
00122    hist = fhTvsI_ch[chId-1];
00123    gbin = hist->GetBin(adcI_bin, tdc_bin);
00124    hist->AddBinContent(gbin);
00125    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00126 
00127    hist = fhIvsA_ch[chId-1];
00128    gbin = hist->GetBin(adcA_bin, adcI_bin);
00129    hist->AddBinContent(gbin);
00130    hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00131 
00132    //hist = (TH1*) o["hBunchCounts"];
00133    //hist->AddBinContent(ch->GetBunchId() + 1);
00134    //hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00135 
00136    //hist = ((TH1*) o["hStripCounts"]);
00137    //hist->AddBinContent(chId);
00138    //hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+1);
00139 
00140    hist = ((TH1*) o["hRevolutionId"]);
00141    hist->Fill(ch->GetRevolutionId());
00142 }

00146 void CnipolRawExtendedHists::FillDerivedPassOne()
00147 {
00148    Info("FillDerivedPassOne()", "Called");
00149 
00150    for (UShort_t iCh=1; iCh<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iCh++)
00151    {
00152       TH1* hTvsA_ch = (TH1*) fhTvsA_ch[iCh-1];
00153 
00154       for (UShort_t iBunchId=1; iBunchId<=N_BUNCHES; iBunchId++)
00155       {
00156          TH2* hTvsA_ch_b = (TH2*) fhTvsA_ch_b[iCh-1][iBunchId-1];
00157 
00158          hTvsA_ch->Add(hTvsA_ch_b);
00159 
00160          Double_t nEntries = hTvsA_ch_b->GetEntries();
00161          ((TH2I*) o["hChIdVsBunchId"])->SetBinContent(iBunchId, iCh, nEntries);
00162          ((TH2I*) o["hChIdVsBunchId"])->SetEntries(((TH2I*) o["hChIdVsBunchId"])->GetEntries() + nEntries);
00163 
00164          TH1* hist = ((TH1*) o["hBunchCounts"]);
00165          hist->AddBinContent(iBunchId, nEntries);
00166          hist->SetEntries(hist->GetEntries()+nEntries);
00167 
00168          //utils::ConvertToCumulative2(hTvsA_ch_b, (TH1F*) fhTvsACumul_ch_b[iCh-1][iBunchId-1]);
00169       }
00170 
00171       ((TH1I*) o["hStripCounts"])->SetBinContent(iCh, hTvsA_ch->GetEntries());
00172       ((TH1I*) o["hStripCounts"])->SetEntries(((TH1I*) o["hStripCounts"])->GetEntries() + hTvsA_ch->GetEntries());
00173    }
00174 
00175    // Fill parent class histograms
00176    CnipolRawHists::FillDerivedPassOne();
00177 }
